name: Arc
description: Deals lightning damage. On a hit, deals half damage to 1 additional creature within 2m of the hit target.

name: Burst Fire
description: Can make a normal single-target attack, or it can spray a 4m-cube area within normal range with shots. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take the weapon's normal damage. This action uses 3 heat.

name: Charge
description: You can use your attack action to charge the weapon. Each charge consumes 1 heat and increases the RoF by 1. If the number of charges equals the heat of the weapon, it overheats and cannot be fired until reloaded.

name: Double Tap
description: When you make a ranged attack with this weapon, you can use your bonus action to make a second ranged attack. You do not add your ability modifier to the damage of the bonus attack, unless that modifier is negative. The second attack may be on the same or a different target.

name: Hip Fire
description: When making a ranged attack on a target creature within 2m, you do not have disadvantage on the attack roll

name: Melee
description: Damage resulting from melee weapon attacks by-pass shields. Technically, this is a weapon type, but this mechanic still applies to all weapons of this type.

name: Rare
description: Hard to come by. I.e., very unlikely to find in a standard shop and more likely to be looted.

name: Two-handed
description: This weapon must be fired with two hands. Otherwise you automatically fail the attack roll.

name: Unique
description: Cannot benefit from any weapon mods.
